articles.description: India Business News: SBI has raised interest rates on short-term fixed deposits by 50 basis points, marking its largest increase in recent months. The bank now offers 3.5%

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Foxconn invests Rs 461 crore in Bengaluru unit - Deccan Herald
articles.description: New Delhi, Dec 27 (PTI) Taiwanese electronics manufacturing services major Foxconn has infused about USD 55.29 million (Rs 461 crore) in Bengaluru-based Foxconn Precision Engineering Private Limited, according to a regulatory filing.
articles.content: Foxconn Singapore has acquired about 46,08,76,736 shares at Rs 10 each, amounting to around $55.29 million (Rs 460.87 crore), according to the filing.
